name: search
description: Quick search for simple queries using Perplexity's Sonar Pro model. Best for straightforward questions and basic information lookup.

force_model.description: Optional: Force using this model even if query seems complex

name: reason
description: Handles complex, multi-step tasks using Perplexity's Sonar Reasoning Pro model. Best for explanations, comparisons, and problem-solving.

query.description: The complex query or task to reason about

force_model.description: Optional: Force using this model even if query seems simple/research-oriented

name: deep_research
description: Conducts in-depth analysis and generates detailed reports using Perplexity's Sonar Deep Research model. Best for comprehensive research topics.

query.description: The research topic or question to investigate in depth

focus_areas.description: Optional: Specific aspects or areas to focus on

force_model.description: Optional: Force using this model even if query seems simple
